DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was the bioequivalence of a Roxane lithium carbonate 300 mg extended release tablet formulation compared to Solvay's Lithobid 300 mg extended release tablet under fed conditions using a single-dose, randomized, 2 treatment, 2-period, 2-sequence crossover design.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of 300 mg Lithium Carbonate Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to lithium, or any comparable or similar product.
